query.sfwSql: select PBR.* from SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR PBR INNER JOIN SGT_PLAN P ON P.PLAN_ID=PBR.PLAN_ID WHERE P.PLAN_CODE LIKE 'Local52'
select PLAN_BENEFIT_ID from SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR where PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID and BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE=@BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE

IF(@aintPlanId = 4) SELECT CODE_VALUE, DESCRIPTION FROM SGS_CODE_VALUE WHERE CODE_VALUE IN ('3YLA') AND CODE_ID = 1504 ELSE SELECT CODE_VALUE, DESCRIPTION FROM SGS_CODE_VALUE WHERE CODE_VALUE IN ('LUMP','LIFE','10LA') AND CODE_ID = 1504

IF @SUB_PLAN='EE' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.EE_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='UVHP' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.UVHP_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L52_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L52_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L161_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L161_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END

IF @SUB_PLAN='EE' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.EE_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.WITHDRAWAL_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='UVHP' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.UVHP_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.WITHDRAWAL_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L52_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L52_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.WITHDRAWAL_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L161_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L161_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.WITHDRAWAL_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END

IF @SUB_PLAN='EE & UVHP' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.EE_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.UVHP_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DEATH_PRE_RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L52_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L52_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DEATH_PRE_RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L161_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L161_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DEATH_PRE_RETIREMENT_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END

IF @SUB_PLAN='EE' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.EE_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DISABILITY_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='UVHP' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.UVHP_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DISABILITY_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L52_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L52_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DISABILITY_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
ELSE IF @SUB_PLAN='L161_SPL_ACC' BEGIN SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.L161_SPL_ACC_FLAG='Y' and SPBX.DISABILITY_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID END
SELECT PLAN_ID,BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE From SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR WHERE PLAN_BENEFIT_ID=@PLAN_BENEFIT_ID

SELECT DISTINCT SPBX.*, SCV.DESCRIPTION FROM SGT_PLAN_BENEFIT_XR SPBX WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN SGS_CODE_VALUE SCV WITH(NOLOCK) ON SCV.CODE_ID = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_ID AND SCV.CODE_VALUE = SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE WHERE SPBX.WITHDRAWAL_FLAG='Y' AND SPBX.PLAN_ID=@PLAN_ID AND SPBX.BENEFIT_OPTION_VALUE = 'LUMP'

attribute.sfwCaption: Death Pre Retirement Post Election Flag
